features.heading: Konke Okudingayo Ukuze Ukhule Emhlabeni Jikelele
features.subheading: Amathuluzi anamandla akhiwe amabhizinisi asemanje asebenza ngaphesheya kwemingcele

operations.title: Ukulawula Imisebenzi
operations.description: Yenza imisebenzi yakho yansuku zonke ibe lula

global.title: Amathuluzi Ebhizinisi Lomhlaba Jikelele
global.description: Konke okudingayo ukuze usebenze emhlabeni wonke

aboutDescription1: Yasungulwa ngo-2023, i-Dott iyinkundla ephelele yokuphatha ibhizinisi eyakhiwe ngokukhethekile yamabhizinisi amancane, abasebenzi abazimele, abaluleki, namabhizinisi amancane kakhulu.
aboutDescription2: Okwenza i-Dott ihluke ukuqonda kwethu okujulile kwezinselelo ezihlukile ezibhekene namabhizinisi amancane, ikakhulukazi emasizindeni adlondlobala.
missionStatement: E-Dott, umgomo wethu ukuguquzela amabhizinisi amancane ukuba aphumelele ngokubanika amathuluzi okuphatha afikeleleka kalula, atholakala kalula, futhi anamandla enza imisebenzi yansuku zonke ibe lula.
visionStatement: Sibona umhlaba lapho amabhizinisi amancane efinyelela kumathuluzi okuphatha aseqophelweni elifanayo nesamagcokama amakhulu, kodwa ahlinzekelwe izidingo zabo ezikhethekile kanye nosayizi.
heroDescription: Ukuphatha ibhizinisi lomhlaba jikelele ngokulawula impahlakahle ngokusezingeni eliphezulu, ukuskena i-barcode, kanye nezixazululo zokukhokha zezifunda – konke kuyi-platform elula yamabhizinisi emhlabeni jikelele.

hero.title: Software Yebhizinisi Konke-Kunye
hero.subtitle: Mahhala unomphela ngamagugu ayisisekelo
hero.description: Ukuphatha ibhizinisi lomhlaba jikelele ngokulawula impahlakahle ngokusezingeni eliphezulu, ukuskena i-barcode, kanye nezixazululo zokukhokha zezifunda – konke kuyi-platform elula yamabhizinisi emhlabeni jikelele.
hero.trustedBy: Kuthenjwa amabhizinisi angaphezu kwe-10,000 emhlabeni jikelele
hero.paymentNote: Izindleko zokucubungula izinkokhelo zingase zisebenze ezinhlobonhlobo ezithile zokuthengiselana

featuresSubtitle: Konke okudingayo ukuphatha ibhizinisi lakho ngokulula emazweni angaphezu kwe-100
pricingTitle: Konke kuhlanganisiwe kuhlelokusebenza lethu le-Professional nge-$15/ngenyanga kuphela
pricingDescription: Awekho amanani afihliwe. Awekho amanani angeziwe okuphrinta i-barcode noma ukuxhuma i-scanner.
feature_global_accounting_desc: Amathuluzi e-akhawunti alula ukusetshenziswa axhasa izimali eziningi kanye nezinhlelo zentela zamabhizinisi noma kuphi emhlabeni.
feature_inventory_&_barcode_management_d: Landela amazinga empahla, printa ama-barcode, futhi usebenzisane nabaskena be-Bluetooth ukuze ulawule impahla ngokulula.
feature_worldwide_payment_solutions_desc: Yamukela izinkokhelo emhlabeni jikelele ngamakhadi esikweletu, ukudlulisela ebhange, imali yeselula, kanye nezindlela zokukhokha zezifunda.
feature_payroll_&_hr_desc: Phatha abasebenzi, amaholo, imihlomulo, nemibhalo ye-HR konke endaweni eyodwa, ngokuxhasa izifunda eziningi.
feature_reports_&_analytics_desc: Thola ulwazi ngezibiko ezingasetshenziselwa izinhloso ezithile, uhlahlelo lwebhizinisi lwangempela, kanye nezincomo eziholwa nge-AI.
feature_mobile_money_integration_desc: Yamukela izinkokhelo nge-M-Pesa, MTN, Airtel Money nezinye izinhlelo zokukhokha ngeselula ezidume kakhulu e-Africa nase-Asia.
feature_invoicing_&_factoring_desc: Dala ama-invoysi anobuchule ngezimali eziningi kanye nezinketho ze-factoring zamabhizinisi e-US nase-Canada.
feature_cross-border_commerce_desc: Phatha ukuthengisa emhlabeni jikelele, ukungenisa, ukuthumela ngaphandle, futhi ulandele izimiso zentela zezifunda ngokulula.
highlights_title: Kungani Ukhethe Inkundla Yethu Yomhlaba Jikelele
highlights_subtitle: Idizayinelwe ukuxhasa amabhizinisi ngokuqabuka imingcele ngokulawula kwempahla okunamandla
highlight_desc_global_business_solution: Idizayinelwe amabhizinisi emhlabeni jikelele ngokuxhasa amazwe angaphezu kwe-100, izimali eziningi, kanye nezindlela zokukhokha ezikhethekile ngokwezifunda.
highlight_desc_advanced_inventory_tools: Ukuphrinta i-barcode nokuxhuma neskena se-Bluetooth kuhlanganisiwe kuhlelokusebenza lethu le-Professional ngaphandle kwezindleko ezingeziwe.
highlight_desc_fast_&_efficient: I-platform esekelwe ku-cloud elungiselelwe ukushesha nokusebenza ngokulula, ikusize ukuphatha ibhizinisi lakho ngokushesha noma uphi.
highlight_desc_secure_&_compliant: Ukuvikeleka kwezinga lebhange nezici zokulandelwa kwezifunda kuqinisekisa ukuthi idatha yakho yebhizinisi iphephile futhi iyalandela izimiso zendawo.
highlight_desc_global_support: Ithimba lethu lokunakekela elinikezelwe liyaqonda izimo zamabhizinisi ezindaweni futhi liyatholakala emazingeni amaningi esikhathi kanye nezilimi.
highlights_pricing_title: Zonke izici, kuhlanganise nokuphrinta i-barcode nokuxhuma neskena, kuhlanganisiwe kuhlelokusebenza lethu le-Professional nge-$15/ngenyanga kuphela
highlights_pricing_subtitle: Awekho amanani afihliwe. Awekho amasethi amanani anzima. Kuhlelo olulula olulodwa kuphela lamabhizinisi omhlaba jikelele.
faq_subtitle: Unemibuzo mayelana nenkundla yethu yebhizinisi lomhlaba jikelele? Sinezimpendulo.
faq_a_what_is_dott: I-Dott iyinkundla yokuphatha ibhizinisi lomhlaba jikelele exhasa amabhizinisi emazweni angaphezu kwe-100. Ihlanganisa i-akhawunti, iholo, i-HR, ukulawula impahlakahle nokusebenza kwe-barcode, kanye nezinketho ezahlukahlukene zokukhokha, kuhlanganise nemali yeselula, kusixazululo esilula.
faq_a_how_much_does_it_cost: Sihlinzeka uhlelo lwe-Basic olumahhala lamabhizinisi asanda kuqala kanye nohlelo lwe-Professional lwe-$15/ngenyanga ($150/ngonyaka). Uhlelo lwe-Professional luhlanganisa zonke izici, kuhlanganise nokuphrinta i-barcode nokuxhuma neskena, ngaphandle kwezindleko ezifihliwe. Ungakhuphula noma wehlise noma nini.
faq_a_which_countries_do_you_support: I-Dott ixhasa amabhizinisi emazweni angaphezu kwe-100 emhlabeni jikelele, ngezici ezikhethekile zezifunda ezithile njengokuxhuma kwemali yeselula e-Africa, i-factoring ye-invoysi e-US nase-Canada, kanye namathuluzi okulawula ezimo eziningi ezilawulwayo.
faq_q_does_dott_support_mobile_money_pay: Ingabe i-Dott ixhasa izinkokhelo zemali yeselula?

feature.inventory.description: Ukulandelela izinga lempahlakahle ngesikhathi sangempela ngokuhlola i-barcode kanye nokusekelwa kwendawo eziningi
feature.barcode.description: Khiqiza futhi uhlole ama-barcode ezinto nezincwadi
feature.invoicing.description: Ama-invoice ochwepheshe ngezimali ezingaphezu kuka-50 ngokuguqula ngokuzenzakalayo
feature.tax.description: Ukubala intela okuzenzakalayo emazweni angaphezu kwe-100
feature.payments.description: Yamukela izinkokhelo ngezindlela zasendaweni ezweni ngalinye
feature.global.description: Phatha imibhalo yohwebo yamazwe ngamazwe nokuthobela

faq_a_does_dott_support_mobile_money_pay: Yebo! Sixhasa ukuxhuma nezinkundla zemali yeselula ezidumile njenge-M-Pesa, i-MTN Mobile Money, i-Airtel Money, nabanye e-Africa nase-Asia. Lokhu kuvumela ibhizinisi lakho ukwamukela nokuphatha kalula izindlela zokukhokha zasendaweni.
faq_q_how_does_the_barcode_and_inventory: Isici seskena se-barcode nesempahla sisebenza kanjani?
faq_a_how_does_the_barcode_and_inventory: Uhlelo lwethu lwe-Professional luhlanganisa ikhono lokudala nokuprinta ama-barcode ezinto zakho zempahla kanye nokusincroniza neskena se-barcode se-Bluetooth ukuphatha kalula impahlakahle. Lesi sici sihlanganiswe ngaphandle kwezindleko ezingeziwe futhi sisebenza kahle nohlelokusebenza lethu lokulawula impahlakahle.
faq_a_is_my_data_secure: Ngokuqinisekile. Sisebenzisa ukubethela okuvikelekile kwezinga lebhange futhi silandela izindlela ezingcono zemboni ukuvikela idatha yakho. Inkundla yethu igcinwe kumasevisi efu ephephile enezigaba eziningi zokuphepha, izici zokulawula kwezifunda, kanye nokwenza amabackup njalo.
faq_a_can_i_import_data_from_other_syste: Yebo, ungayingenisa idatha esuka ezindimeleni ezahlukahlukene, kuhlanganise i-Excel, i-CSV, kanye nezinye izinkundla ze-akhawunti. Sihlinzeka futhi nosizo lokuhamba kwamabhizinisi asuka kwezinye izinkundla, ngokuxhasa izindimela zedatha zamazwe ngamazwe.
faq_a_what_kind_of_support_do_you_offer: Sihlinzeka ngoxhaso lwamakhasimende ngezikhathi eziningi nge-chat, i-imeyili, kanye namakholi ahleliwe. Ithimba lethu lihlanganisa izingcweti ezijwayelene nezindlela zebhizinisi zezifunda ukuhlinzeka ngosizo oluhambisanayo, noma ibhizinisi lakho lisebenza kuphi.
faq_a_how_does_multi-currency_support_wo: I-Dott ikuvumela ukuthi usebenze ngezimali eziningi ngasikhathi sinye, ngokubuyekeza okuphothulwayo kwezintengo zokulula. Ungakhipha ama-invoysi kumakhasimende akho ngezimali zabo zasendaweni, ulandelele izindleko ngezimali ezahlukene, futhi ukhiqize imibiko ngemali oyikhethayo.
contact_support: Xhumana neqembu lethu loxhaso lomhlaba jikelele ku-support@dottapps.com
regional_pricing: Amanani esifunda asetshenzisiwe: Izinga elikhululekile elithuthukisiwe nokwehliswa ngo-50% kwi-Enterprise ({0})
developing_country_notice: Izici ezithuthukisiwe ziyatholakala esifundeni sakho! Amanani nge-{0}
pricing_footer: Amanani awahlanganisi intela esebenzayo. Ukubhalisa kuzozikhokha ngokwako. Khansela noma nini.
developing_country_discount: Amanani esifunda akhethekile asetshenzisiwe: Ukwehliswa ngo-50% kwizinga le-Enterprise
feature_global_payments_with_reduced_tra: Izinkokhelo zomhlaba jikelele nezindleko zokuhweba ezincishisiwe
feature_global_payments:_stripe,_paypal,: Izinkokhelo zomhlaba jikelele: i-Stripe, i-PayPal, nemali yeselula (MTN, M-Pesa, Airtel)
feature_global_payments_with_lowest_tran: Izinkokhelo zomhlaba jikelele nezindleko zokuhweba eziphansi kakhulu
select_plan_description: Khetha uhlelo olufanelana kangcono nezidingo zebhizinisi lakho
feature_single_user_account_with_view-on: I-akhawunti yomsebenzisi oyedwa nokufinyelela kumbali-zimali okubuka kuphela
feature_5_gb_storage_with_12_months_tran: 5 GB yokugcina enemlando yezokuhweba yezinyanga eziyi-12
feature_basic_offline_mode_for_inconsist: Indlela engaxhunyiwe eyisisekelo yokuxhumana okungahambi kahle
heroSubtitle: Mahhala kuze kube phakade ngezici eziyisisekelo
heroTrustedBy: Ithenjwa amabhizinisi angaphezu kuka-10,000 emhlabeni wonke
feature_inventory_desc: Landelela amazinga esitoko, khiqiza amabhakhodi, uphate izindawo eziningi ngokuvuselelwa kwesikhathi sangempela.
feature_pos_desc: Yamukela izinkokhelo, phatha ukuthengisa, ulandelele impahla ohlelweni lwe-POS olusebenziseka kalula.
feature_invoicing_desc: Dala ama-invoice ochwepheshe, amakhotheshini, nezikweletu eziphindaphindayo ngemizuzwana. Khokhwa ngokushesha.
feature_payroll_desc: Khokha abasebenzi, phatha izinzuzo, landelela ikhefu, uphathemadaba zonke izidingo ze-HR endaweni eyodwa.
feature_accounting_desc: Landelela imali engenayo, izindleko bese wenza imibiko yezimali. Hlala ulungele intela unyaka wonke.
feature_payments_desc: Yamukela amakhadi wesikweletu, ukudlulisela kwebhange, imali yomakhalekhukhwini, nezindlela zokukhokha ezingaphezu kuka-50 emhlabeni wonke.
feature_crm_desc: Yakha ubudlelwano obuhlala njalo ngedatha yamakhasimende ehlelekile, amanothi, nomlando wokuxhumana.
feature_analytics_desc: Thola ukuqonda okuhlakaniphile nokubikezela ukwenza izinqumo zebhizinisi ezingcono ngokuhlaziya okunamandla kwe-AI.
faq_a_is_it_really_free: Yebo! Uhlelo lwethu Oluyisisekelo lumahhala kuze kube phakade ngaphandle kwekhadi lesikweletu. Lufaka izici ezibalulekile zama-freelancer namabhizinisi amancane aqalayo. Ungathuthukisa noma nini njengoba ibhizinisi lakho likhula.
faq_a_can_i_switch_plans: Impela! Ungathuthukisa noma wehlise uhlelo lwakho noma nini. Izinguquko zisebenza ngokushesha futhi sizolinganisa noma yiziphi izinkokhelo. Azikho izinkontileka zesikhathi eside noma izindleko zokukhansela.
faq_a_do_you_offer_mobile_apps: Yebo! I-Dott isebenza kahle kunoma iyiphi idivayisi ngesiphequluli sakho sewebhu. Futhi sinezinhlelo zokusebenza ezikhethekile ze-iOS ne-Android zokuphatha ibhizinisi lakho lapho uhamba. Zonke izici zivumelanisa ngesikhathi sangempela phakathi kwamadivayisi.
cta_subtitle: Joyina amabhizinisi angaphezu kuka-10,000 asevele esebenzisa i-Dott

mobile.title: Uhlelo Lokusebenza Lweselula
mobile.description: Phatha ibhizinisi lakho noma kuphi emhlabeni wonke ngezinhlelo zokusebenza ze-Android ne-iOS zethu.

pos.title: I-POS Nokuskena Ngebhakhodi
pos.description: Yamukela izinkokhelo ngokushesha ngezinhlelo zokucubungula izinkokhelo ezinamandla kanye nezithuluzi zokuskena ngebhakhodi.

ai.title: Ukuqonda Okuqhutshwa Yi-AI
ai.description: Sebenzisa i-AI ukuthola ukuqonda okujulile ngamabhizinisi akho neziphakamiso eziwusizo.

geofencing.title: I-Geofencing Nokulandelela Indawo
geofencing.description: Gada abasebenzi bakho bese uphatha imisebenzi ngokulandelela indawo kwesimanje kanye ne-geofencing.

mobilemoney.title: Izinkokhelo Zemali Yeselula
mobilemoney.description: Yamukela izinkokhelo noma kuphi emhlabeni nge-M-Pesa, i-MTN Mobile Money, i-Airtel Money, nabanye.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Business
whatsapp.description: Guqula ukuxhumana namakhasimende ngokusebenzisa ukuhlanganiswa kwe-WhatsApp Business. Dala futhi uphathe ikhathalogi yakho yemikhiqizo, thumela ama-invoysi namaresethi ngokuzenzakalelayo, nikeza ukuxhaswa kwamakhasimende ngokushesha, futhi uxhumane nabo kunkundla yabo yokuthumela imiyalezo eyintandokazi.

languages.title: Ukuxhaswa Kwezilimi Ezingu-20+
languages.description: Sebenza ngolimi lwakho. Sixhasa izilimi ezingaphezu kuku-20 yamabhizinisi omhlaba wonke.

builtForYou.title: Kwakhelwe Wena
builtForYou.heading: Phatha ibhizinisi lakho njengoChwepheshe!
builtForYou.cta: Joyina izinkulungwane zabanikazi bamabhizinisi emhlabeni jikelele abathemba i-Dott ukuphatha amabhizinisi abo

freelancers.title: Abasebenzi Abazimele
freelancers.description: Landelela amaphrojekthi, khokhisa amakhasimende ngokushesha, futhi uphathe izezimali zakho zonke endaweni eyodwa. Khokhwa ngokushesha ngama-invoysi anobuchule.

contractors.title: Osonkontileka
contractors.description: Phatha amaphrojekthi amaningi, landelela izinto nezindleko zabasebenzi, futhi uthumele amakhotheshini anobuchule. Gcina ukugeleza kwemali yakho kuphilile.

entrepreneurs.title: Osomabhizinisi
entrepreneurs.description: Khulisa isiqalo sakho ngamathuluzi anamandla okwenza impahlakahle, ukuthengisa, nokulandelela kwezezimali. Yenza izinqumo ezisekelwe kudatha.

consultants.title: Abeluleki
consultants.description: Khokhisa ngehora noma ngephrojekthi, landelela izindleko, futhi uphathe amakhasimende amaningi kalula. Ufaka ama-invoysi anobuchule.

retail.title: Abanikazi Bezitolo Zokudayisa
retail.description: Phatha impahlakahle ngokuskena i-barcode, landelela ukuthengisa, futhi wamukele izindlela zokukhokha eziningi kuhlanganise nemali yeselula.

streetVendors.title: Abadayisi Basemgwaqweni
streetVendors.description: Idizayini elula yeselula-kuqala ukuze ulandelele ukuthengisa kwansuku zonke, uphathe impahlakahle, futhi wamukele izinkokhelo zedijithali lapho uhamba.

marketStalls.title: Abanikazi Bezitolo Zemakethe
marketStalls.description: Iphelele ezinsukwini zemakethe eziphithizelayo. Ukufaka okuthengisayo okusheshayo, izaziso zempahlakahle encane, nokulandelela inzuzo yansuku zonke ngemali yakho yendawo.

mobileMoneyAgents.title: Ama-ejenti Emali Yeselula
mobileMoneyAgents.description: Landelela izimali, phatha amabhalansi antantayo, futhi ukhiqize imibiko yabaphathi benethiwekhi. Kwakhelwe i-M-Pesa, MTN, nabanye.

restaurants.title: Abanikazi Bezindawo Zokudlela Ezincane
restaurants.description: Phatha ama-oda, landelela izithako, bala izindleko zokudla, futhi uphathise kokubili ukudla phakathi nokuthatha ngaphandle ngempumelelo.

serviceProviders.title: Abahlinzeki Besevisi
serviceProviders.description: Abaphulumbi, ogesi, omakhenikha, nabanye. Hlela imisebenzi, landelela izingxenye, futhi khokhisa ngokuphela.

onlineSellers.title: Abadayisi Ku-inthanethi
onlineSellers.description: Vumelanisa impahlakahle kuwo wonke amapulatifomu, phatha ama-oda, futhi ulandelele ukuthunyelwa. Iphelele kubadayisi bezinkundla zokuxhumana.

transport.title: Abaqhubi Bezokuthutha
transport.description: Abashayeli bamatekisi, boda boda, nama-tuk-tuk. Landelela imali engenayo yansuku zonke, izindleko zikaphethiloli, namashejuli okulungiswa.

cookieBanner.title: Isaziso Se-Cookie
cookieBanner.message: Sisebenzisa ama-cookies ukuthuthukisa ukuzizwisa kwakho, ukuhlaziya ukusetshenziswa, nokuhlinzeka ngezici ezibalulekile. Ngokuqhubeka nokusebenzisa isayithi yethu, uyavuma ukusebenzisa ama-cookies.

essential.title: Ama-Cookies Abalulekile
essential.description: Ayadingeka ukuze kusebenze isayithi ngokuyisisekelo kanye nokuphepha

analytics.title: Ama-Cookies Okuhlaziya
analytics.description: Sisize ukuqonda ukuthi usebenzisa kanjani isayithi yethu
